Dragon Aura.name: Dragon Aura
Dragon Aura.flavor: The innate energy of your draconic breath forms a shield around you, pushing your enemies away.
Dragon Aura.onHit: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier or Charisma modifier damage, and push the target 1 square. The damage is the same type as any type you can deal with your dragon breath.

Dragon Tempest.name: Dragon Tempest
Dragon Tempest.flavor: Your exhalation of elemental energy transforms into a swirling vortex of power.
Dragon Tempest.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier or Charisma modifier damage. The damage is the same type as any type you can deal with your dragon breath.
Dragon Tempest.effect: The blast becomes a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. A creature that enters or starts its turn in the zone takes 10 damage of the same type as the initial attack's damage (a creature can take this damage only once per turn). As a move action, you can move the zone 3 squares.

Countering Breath.name: Countering Breath
Countering Breath.flavor: As your foe unleashes a blast of elemental power, you release your own, subtly altering your draconic breath to negate your enemy’s attack.
Countering Breath.trigger: An enemy targets you with a close or area attack that deals a damage type you can deal with dragon breath
Countering Breath.effect: Your space and the blast are not considered part of the triggering attack’s area of effect.
